events.description: Doors - 6:30pm Show - 8:00pm All Ages **All support acts are subject to change without notice** To reduce staff contact with guest belongings, we have implemented the following bag policy: Bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" are allowed in the venue. All bags will be searched prior to entry. Bags that are not clear will be subject to additional search.
